Original Source:
Pennington, Kate (2018). Bay Area Craigslist Rental Housing Posts, 2000-2018. Retrieved from https://github.com/katepennington/historic_bay_area_craigslist_housing_posts/blob/master/clean_2000_2018.csv.zip.

TidyTuesday Page: https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/main/data/2022/2022-07-05

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2022-07-05')
rent <- tuesdata$rent
```

```{r}
ggplot(rent, aes(x = price)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap("county") +
  labs(title = "Prices of Rentals in Different San Francisco Counties", x = "Price(USD)") +
  theme_minimal()
```
